DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to describe patient preferences on budesonide/formoterol fix dose combination for the treatment of their COPD, and to find those factors more strongly associated to a better attitude to medication.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of Questionnaire and Assessment of Patient Satisfaction for Budesonide/Formoterol Fix Combination Dry Powder Inhalers (DPI) in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.detailed_description: Validation of questionnaire and assessment of patient satisfaction for budesonide/formoterol fix combination DPI in COPD
